title: Peppo Card Structure
content:
[[module ListPages fullname="{$articleURL}" category="*"]]
[[div class="floater"]]
[[div class="cardHead"]]
= {$articleTitle}
[[/div]]
[[div class="{$showPic}"]]
[[div class="picShadow"]]
[[/div]]
[[image {$articleImage}]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="article-name"]]
= {$articleName}
[[/div]]
[[div class="{$ratePlace}"]]
@@+@@ %%rating%%
[[/div]]
[[div class="article-quote"]]
= //"{$articleQuote}"//
[[/div]]
[[div class="article-credit" style="display: {$showCredit1};"]]
= [[[{$creditLink}|{$articleCredit}]]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="article-credit" style="display: {$showCredit2};"]]
= [[[{$creditLink2}|{$articleCredit2}]]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="image-holder"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Apeppo-card-structure/noise.png class="linkle" link="{$articleLink}"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
author: PeppersGhost
